Tailored for your

We enable you complete business transactions by delivering mails and packages

Our Services

Sending or Recieving Packages?

1. Within the hour deliveries: Our rider picks it up within 30 minutes and has it at the drop off location within 30 minutes.

2. Scheduled deliveries: Dispatch at a scheduled time of your choice.

Quick Mail Services

1. We pick up and drop off documents at designated points.

2. We ensure that we have a signed record that the documents were picked up and dropped off as instructed, for accountability purposes.

How it works

Prepare

Prepare your package and secure it shut.

Request service

To deliver your package/mail.

Pickup

Byke It rider picks package/mail at pickup location.

Delivery

Byke It rider delivers to the drop off point/address.

Billing & Payment

Either at the pickup address or drop off point.

Repeat

Over and over again.
